pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Scale Geomorphometric Terrain Attributes // Calculates multi-scale geomorphometric terrain attributes from regularly gridded digital terrain models using a variable focal windows size (Misiuk et al. (2021) doi:10.1080/01490419.2021.1925789; Wilson et al. (2007) doi:10.1080/01490410701295962; Wood (1996) https://hdl.handle.net/2381/34503).
